question: How many countries have been suspended from weightlifting for a year by the International Weightlifting Federation (IWF).
explanation: Nine countries have been suspended from weightlifting for a year by the International Weightlifting Federation (IWF). The member federations identified as such are currently Armenia, Azerbaijan, Belarus, China, Kazakhstan, Moldova, Russia, Turkey and Ukraine. Countries with at least three doping offenses from those Olympics were suspended.
